full_summary:
================
### Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) Tender Announcement

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites companies to submit bids for the procurement of seven (7) Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS). 

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01023044
* **Solicitation Number**: M4500-3-3345
* **Publication Date**: January 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 9, 2023 13:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Tender Status**: Expiré

### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering seven RPAS to Fredericton, NB. The detailed requirements are outlined in Annex A of the tender documents. All deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2023.

The basis of selection will be based on compliance with the bid solicitation requirements and the presence of mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. In event of a tie (i.e., same price and lowest evaluated), the bidder with the earliest delivery date will be given preference.

### Procurement Notice

This tender is conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses. The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions will apply in RCMP contracting activities.

Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement, bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
